trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Grass Valley
There were no other sightings in Grass Valley on or around October 1st 2008
divs: Sighting Details My buddy and I were looking for Jupiter at aproximatley 6:30 pm And My buddy found what he thought was jupiter and said it looks strange so I got my 10 inch dobsonian with a 32 mm eyepiece and found what he was looking at, it was moving at a steady speed going from west to east over the SACRAMENTO VALLEY area, it had either square or round orbs with a long tether below it. Twice in the 15 minutes I watched it dropped smaller orbs that would fall at a steady speed then go at a left angle, I doubled my eye piece which altered the strength to 16mm, and I saw much better detail, deffinatley round red and white orbs flashing. POSSIBLEY A WEATHER BALLON DROPPING FLARES but it was awsome to look at through my Big telescope!!
Summary: I watched this object with my 10 inch DOBSOINIAN TELESCOPE
